Protocols/IDCaptureSessionDelegate.html#.name: idCaptureSession(_:didFinishWithResult:)
Protocols/IDCaptureSessionDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when the session finishes. Use the result’s status property to determine the outcome of the session.

Enums/ISOCardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.name: id1
Enums/ISOCardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.abstract: ID-1: Most banking cards and ID cards

Enums/ISOCardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.name: id2
Enums/ISOCardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.abstract: ID-2: French and other ID cards, visas

Classes/FacePhotoFeature.html#/c:@M@VerI.name: template
Classes/FacePhotoFeature.html#/c:@M@VerI.abstract: The face template that can be used for face comparison using Ver-ID

Classes/CardFeature.html#/s:16VerIDCrede.name: bounds
Classes/CardFeature.html#/s:16VerIDCrede.abstract: Expected or detected bounds of the feature (defaults to CGRect.null)

Classes/CardFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.name: detected
Classes/CardFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDCred.abstract: true if the feature was detected in an image

Classes/CardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCrede.name: cornerRadiusForCardFormat(_:atSize:)
Classes/CardFormat.html#/c:@M@VerIDCrede.abstract: Calculates the corner radius of the card at the given size

Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.name: cornerRadius
Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.abstract: Corner radius of the card in mm

Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.name: imagePath
Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.abstract: Path of the card image relative to the app’s documents directory

Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.name: imageURL
Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.abstract: URL of the image of the card

Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.name: detected
Classes/Card.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials.abstract: Indicates whether all features on the card have been detected

Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.name: idBundle
Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.abstract: ID bundle to detect in the session

Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.name: showGuide
Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.abstract: true to show guidance during the session to the user

Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.name: showResult
Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.abstract: true to show the result of the session to the user before calling the session’s delegate

Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.name: detectFaceForRecognition
Classes/IDCaptureSessionSettings.html#/c.abstract: true if the faces detected in the session will be used for face recognition. false will return faces without face templates that cannot be used for face comparison.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: format
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Format of the barcode

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: encoding
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: The way the information in the barcode is encoded

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: payload
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Raw text detected in the barcode

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: init(format:encoding:)
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Barcode feature constructor

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: init(format:payload:)
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Barcode feature constructor with payload

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: surname
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Family name of the cardholder. (Family name is sometimes also called “last name” or “surname.”)

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: name
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: First name of the cardholder.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: nameSuffix
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Name Suffix (If jurisdiction participates in systems requiring name suffix (PDPS, CDLIS, etc.), the suffix is displayed on the DL/ID and in the MRT).

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: issueDate
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Date on which the document was issued.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: expiryDate
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Date on which the driving and identification privileges granted by the document are no longer valid.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: dateOfBirth
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Date on which the cardholder was born.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: eyeColour
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Color of cardholder’s eyes. (ANSI D-20 codes)

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: height
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Height of cardholder.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: street1
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Street portion of the cardholder address.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: street2
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Second line of street portion of the cardholder address.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: city
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: City portion of the cardholder address.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: juridistictionCode
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: State portion of the cardholder address.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: postalCode
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Postal code portion of the cardholder address in the U.S. and Canada. If the trailing portion of the postal code in the U.S. is not known, zeros will be used to fill the trailing set of numbers up to nine (9) digits.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: country
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Country in which DL/ID is issued. U.S. = USA, Canada = CAN.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: weight
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Weight range of the cardholder (kg).

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: documentDiscriminator
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Number that uniquely identifies a particular document issued to the cardholder from others that may have been issued in the past. This number serves multiple purposes of document discrimination, audit information number, and/or inventory control.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: customerIDNumber
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: The number assigned or calculated by the issuing authority.

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: string
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Generates a string representation of the data detected on the ID card

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.name: array
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html#/c:@M@VerIDC.abstract: Generates an array representation of the data detected on the ID card

Classes/IDCaptureSessionResult.html#/c:@.name: idBundle
Classes/IDCaptureSessionResult.html#/c:@.abstract: Detected ID bundle or nil on failure or cancellation

Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.name: cards
Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.abstract: The cards in this identification. Each card represents a page of an ID.

Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.name: faces
Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.abstract: Convenience method to get face photo features in the bundle’s cards

Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.name: barcodes
Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.abstract: Convenience method to get barcode features in the bundle’s cards

Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.name: frontFacePhoto
Classes/IDBundle.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredent.abstract: Convenient way to get the face photo in the first card of the bundle

Classes/IDCaptureSession.html#/c:@M@VerI.name: identifier
Classes/IDCaptureSession.html#/c:@M@VerI.abstract: Session identifier. Useful if you have a single delegate handling multiple sessions and you need to distinguish between them.

Classes/IDBundle.html.name: IDBundle
Classes/IDBundle.html.abstract: Represents a piece of identification like an ID card

Classes.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials@objc.name: SingleSidedPhotoCard
Classes.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials@objc.abstract: Represents a bundle with one side that contains a face photo

Classes.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials@objc.name: DoubleSidedPhotoCardWithPDF417Barcode
Classes.html#/c:@M@VerIDCredentials@objc.abstract: Represents a bundle with one side containing a face photo and another side containing a PDF417 barcode

Classes/BarcodeFeature.html.name: BarcodeFeature
Classes/BarcodeFeature.html.abstract: Represents a barcode found on an ID card

Classes/ISOID1PhotoCard.html.name: ISOID1PhotoCard
Classes/ISOID1PhotoCard.html.abstract: ISO ID-1 card with a face photo

Classes/FacePhotoFeature.html.name: FacePhotoFeature
Classes/FacePhotoFeature.html.abstract: Photograph of a face on a card
